result.eng: May I go to the toilet?
result.ga: An bhfuil cead agam dul go dtí an leithreas
result.orig: An bhfuil cead agam dul go dtí an leithreas
result.html: An bhfuil cead agam dul go dtí an leithreasMay I go to the toilet?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil cead agam dul go dtí an leiṫreasMay I go to the toilet?

result.html: Cá bhfuil an leithreasWhere is the toilet?
result.ponchtml: Cá ḃfuil an leiṫreasWhere is the toilet?

result.eng: Is the toilet the first door on the right?
result.ga: An é an leithreas an chéad doras ar dheis
result.orig: An é an leithreas an chéad doras ar dheis
result.html: An é an leithreas an chéad doras ar dheisIs the toilet the first door on the right?
result.ponchtml: An é an leiṫreas an ċéad doras ar ḋeisIs the toilet the first door on the right?

result.ga: Cá bhfuil an leithreas le do thoil
result.orig: Cá bhfuil an leithreas le do thoil
result.html: Cá bhfuil an leithreas le do thoilWhere is the toilet, please?
result.ponchtml: Cá ḃfuil an leiṫreas le do ṫoilWhere is the toilet, please?
